mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (sno, rcomment, mno, tgroup, rscore) VALUES (#{sno}, #{review}, #{mno}, #{tgroup}, #{rscore})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(rscore = 5) AS countrscore5, SUM(rscore = 4) AS countrscore4, SUM(rscore = 3) AS countrscore3, SUM(rscore = 2) AS countrscore2, SUM(rscore = 1) AS countrscore1 FROM reviewview WHERE sno = #{sno} GROUP BY sno;
